verses.verse: I am <S%G1510><s%> the true <S%G228><s%> vine, <S%G288><s%> and my Father <S%G3962><s%> is the farmer. <S%G1092><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> branch <S%G2814><s%> in me that bears <S%G5342><s%> not fruit <S%G2590><s%> he takes <S%G142><s%> away: and every <S%G3956><s%> branch that bears <S%G5342><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> he purges <S%G2508><s%> it, that it may bring <S%G5342><s%> forth more <S%G4119><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>
Now <S%G2235><s%> you are clean <S%G2513><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you.

Abide <S%G3306><s%> in me, and I in you. As the branch <S%G2814><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> bear <S%G5342><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> of itself, <S%G1438><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> it abide <S%G3306><s%> in the vine; <S%G288><s%> no <S%G3761><s%> more <S%G3761><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> you, except <S%G3362><s%> you abide <S%G3306><s%> in me.

I am <S%G1510><s%> the vine, <S%G288><s%> you are the branches: <S%G2814><s%> He that stays <S%G3306><s%> in me, and I in him, the same <S%G3778><s%> brings <S%G5342><s%> forth much <S%G4183><s%> fruit: <S%G2590><s%> for without <S%G5565><s%> me you can <S%G1410><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> not in me, he is cast <S%G906><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> as a branch, <S%G2814><s%> and is withered; <S%G3583><s%> and men gather <S%G4863><s%> them, and cast <S%G906><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the fire, <S%G4442><s%> and they are burned. <S%G2545><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> you abide <S%G3306><s%> in me, and my words <S%G4487><s%> abide <S%G3306><s%> in you, you shall ask <S%G154><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you will, <S%G2309><s%> and it shall be done <S%G1096><s%> to you.

Herein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5129><s%> is my Father <S%G3962><s%> glorified, <S%G1392><s%> that you bear <S%G5342><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> shall you be my disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
As the Father <S%G3962><s%> has loved <S%G25><s%> me, so <S%G2504><s%> have I loved <S%G25><s%> you: continue <S%G3306><s%> you in my love. <S%G26><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> you keep <S%G5083><s%> my commandments, <S%G1785><s%> you shall abide <S%G3306><s%> in my love; <S%G26><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I have kept <S%G5083><s%> my Father's <S%G3962><s%> commandments, <S%G1785><s%> and abide <S%G3306><s%> in his love. <S%G26><s%>
These <S%G5023><s%> things have I spoken <S%G2980><s%> to you, that my joy <S%G5479><s%> might remain <S%G3306><s%> in you, and that your <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> might be full. <S%G4137><s%>
This <S%G3778><s%> is my commandment, <S%G1785><s%> That you love <S%G26><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> as I have loved <S%G25><s%> you.

Greater <S%G3187><s%> love <S%G26><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> than this, <S%G5026><s%> that a man <S%G5100><s%> lay <S%G5087><s%> down his life <S%G5590><s%> for his friends. <S%G5384><s%>
You are my friends, <S%G5384><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> I command <S%G1781><s%> you.

From now on <S%G3765><s%> I call <S%G3004><s%> you not servants; <S%G1401><s%> for the servant <S%G1401><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> his lord <S%G2962><s%> does: <S%G4160><s%> but I have called <S%G2046><s%> you friends; <S%G5384><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> things that I have heard <S%G191><s%> of my Father <S%G3962><s%> I have made <S%G1107><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to you.

You have not chosen <S%G1586><s%> me, but I have chosen <S%G1586><s%> you, and ordained <S%G5087><s%> you, that you should go <S%G5217><s%> and bring <S%G5342><s%> forth fruit, <S%G2590><s%> and that your <S%G5216><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> should remain: <S%G3306><s%> that whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you shall ask <S%G154><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> he may give <S%G1325><s%> it you.
These <S%G5023><s%> things I command <S%G1781><s%> you, that you love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hate <S%G3404><s%> you, you know <S%G1097><s%> that it hated <S%G3404><s%> me before <S%G4412><s%> it hated you.

If <S%G1487><s%> you were of the world, <S%G2889><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> would love <S%G5368><s%> his own: <S%G2398><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> you are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but I have chosen <S%G1586><s%> you out of the world, <S%G2889><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> hates <S%G3404><s%> you.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> that I said <S%G2036><s%> to you, The servant <S%G1401><s%> is not greater <S%G3187><s%> than his lord. <S%G2962><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> they have persecuted <S%G1377><s%> me, they will also <S%G2532><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> you; if <S%G1487><s%> they have kept <S%G5083><s%> my saying, <S%G3056><s%> they will keep <S%G5083><s%> yours <S%G5212><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
But all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things will they do <S%G4160><s%> to you for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake, because <S%G3754><s%> they know <S%G1097><s%> not him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.

If <S%G1487><s%> I had not come <S%G2064><s%> and spoken <S%G2980><s%> to them, they had <S%G2192><s%> not had sin: <S%G266><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> they have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> cloak <S%G4392><s%> for their sin. <S%G266><s%>
He that hates <S%G3404><s%> me hates <S%G3404><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> I had not done <S%G4160><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them the works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G243><s%> man did, <S%G4160><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> not had sin: <S%G266><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> have they both <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> and hated <S%G3404><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> me and my Father. <S%G3962><s%>

But this comes to pass, that the word <S%G3056><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> that is written <S%G1125><s%> in their law, <S%G3551><s%> They hated <S%G3404><s%> me without <S%G1432><s%> a cause. <S%G1432><s%>

But when <S%G3752><s%> the Comforter <S%G3875><s%> is come, <S%G2064><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I will send <S%G3992><s%> to you from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> even the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of truth, <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> from the Father, <S%G3962><s%> he shall testify <S%G3140><s%> of me:
And you also <S%G2532><s%> shall bear <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you have been <S%G2075><s%> with me from the beginning. <S%G746><s%>
